alert.note: Alert for Foard; Hardeman; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued March 27 at 4:19PM CDT until March 28 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR BREEZY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR SOME OF WESTERN OKLAHOMA AND ADJACENT AREAS OF TEXAS... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR BREEZY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR WESTERN OKLAHOMA AND PORTIONS OF WESTERN NORTH TEXAS... The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Fire Weather Watch for breezy winds and low relative humidity behind a dry line, which is in effect from Tuesday afternoon through Tuesday evening. * WINDS...South 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 17 percent. * MAXIMUM TEMPERATURES...85 to 89 degrees.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
